text: “Udzawaona (tsiku la Qiyâma) amene adadzichitira okha zoipa (popembedza mafano) akuopa chifukwa cha (zoipa) zomwe adachita, ndipo (chilangocho) chidzawapezabe. Koma amene adakhulupirira ndi kuchita zabwino (udzawaona akusangalala) m’Madimba abwino a ku Minda ya mtendere. Iwo akapeza chilichonse chimene akafune kwa Mbuye wawo. Umenewo ndiwo ulemelero wawukulu
